goals.title: Go for a walk
goals.description: Go for a short (or long) walk outside.

goals.title: Go for a run
goals.description: Test your fitness by getting some exercise, it doesn't have to be long!

goals.title: Read a chapter of your book
goals.description: Complete a chapter of your current book or audiobook

goals.title: Phone a friend
goals.description: Know a friend you should catch up with? Get in touch and give them a call!
